title: SCP-5764
content:
**Item #:** SCP-5764

**Object Class:** Safe

**Description:** SCP-5764 is an anomaly that affects this page. It gains sentience every time this page is opened and loses it once the content of the article is shown. SCP-5764 is able to communicate through collapsibles preceding the article's content.

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-5764 is contained within this page, with no chance of containment breach. Further communication with SCP-5764 will result in termination.

Do not open this article again.
@@ @@
